alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 8:56PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Chilton, Shelby and Talladega. * WHEN...Until midnight CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 856 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hoover, Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Calera, Chelsea, Montevallo, Brent, Columbiana, Centreville, Jemison, Wilsonville, Indian Springs Village, Vincent, Harpersville, Westover, West Blocton, Wilton, Shelby County Airport and American Village.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
